room_title: Escape room "Judgment Day" by Escape Room Kansas City in Kansas City
review: My Scholar’s Bowl team and I entered this room and none of the clues worked. All the technology in the room didn’t work regardless of how many times we tried. After trying the puzzles multiple times, we got frustrated and used the walkie talkie to contact the game master. However, the game master said that all our solutions to the clues were correct. She then had to manually enter a command to unlock the next portion. You’d think after spending $30 a person our room would actually work. This happened at least four times with four different puzzles. It was especially frustrating because we were so close to succeeding, and I know that if we had not wasted 1/4 of our time trying to get the game to actually work we would have escaped.

room_title: Escape room "Judgment Day" by Escape Room Kansas City in Kansas City
review: This was our second escape room in one day. We loved the first one so much we decide to try the Union Station terminator room. It was fun even though we had a little technical issue with one of the clues. Overall we enjoyed the problem-solving. Have our family hooked and planning the next event.

room_title: Escape room "Judgment Day" by Escape Room Kansas City in Kansas City
review: We did the Judgment Day Room (Terminator)! This was my first time in an escape room... I am hooked!

room_title: Escape room "Judgment Day" by Escape Room Kansas City in Kansas City
review: We played the Terminator room and it was awesome. Lot of technology and cool gadgets. We were up for the challenge and broke the record for the room! I would recommend this to experienced escapers. The staff was very great and friendly also.

room_title: Escape room "Judgment Day" by Escape Room Kansas City in Kansas City
review: We had a party of 5 people. It was our first one, and wow! We did The Terminator, no regrets at all, except maybe that we didn't have enough experience to finish it. We would definitely recommend it though. The people there were awesome and easy to talk to.Thank you guys so much for the fun and entertainment!
